name: Poker Cannon
description:
** This is a prototype **

Click on any row to load a card to a cannon.  Click on the cannon to shoot.

Forming a poker hand (pair, straight, full house, etc) in a row or column will increase efficiency.

Built the bare mininal to test out the core concept.  There will be more features, but only if this concept works.  Don't worry about the difficulty here, it will be adjusted.  Any feedback is appreciated.

Assets used:

Cards by Andrew Tidey https://opengameart.org/content/cards-set

Cannon https://opengameart.org/content/cannon-and-barbed-wire

Skeleton https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck
